00029                 struct weaponanim
00030                 {
00031                         inline static D3DXVECTOR2 y(float x) {
00032                                 D3DXVECTOR2 out(x - 0.5f, cos(D3DX_PI * x + D3DX_PI * 0.5f) + 1);
00033                                 return out;
00034                         }
00035                 };
00036 
00037                 struct pushbackanim
00038                 {
00039                         inline static float y(float x) {
00040                                 return ((x < 0.1f) ? 1.0f : (1.0f - (x - 1) * (x - 1)));
00041                         }
00042                 };
00043
